er behandlingsansvarlig for behandlingen: is the data controller for the processing of personal data as described in this declaration.
Vi behandler følgende kategorier av pers: We process the following categories of personal data:

Å administrere kontoen din og gi deg til: To manage your account and provide you with access to the service.
Å ivareta sikkerheten og beskytte bruker: To ensure security and protect our users from fraud.
Vi deler ikke dine personopplysninger me: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless it is necessary to fulfill an agreement with you or we are legally required to do so.
Du har følgende rettigheter når det gjel: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
Du kan be om en kopi av dine opplysninge: You can request a copy of your data.
Du kan be oss rette feilaktige opplysnin: You can ask us to correct inaccurate data.
Du kan be oss slette dine data (med unnt: You can request that we delete your data (except data we are legally required to retain).
Du kan få utlevert dine data i et maskin: You can receive your data in a machine-readable format.
Har du spørsmål eller bekymringer angåen: Do you have any questions or concerns regarding your rights?
Hvis du mener vi ikke overholder personv: If you believe we are not complying with data protection laws, you can file a complaint with the Norwegian Data Protection Authority:
Behandlingen av personopplysninger hos o: The processing of personal data with us is done in accordance with
Du kan lese mer om lovverket og dine ret: You can read more about the legislation and your rights on the website of the Norwegian Data Protection Authority:
Om personopplysningsloven og når den gje: About the Personal Data Act and when it applies

deretter gå til Medlemskap → Brukerinnst: then go to Membership → User Settings →
Vi tar sikkerhet på alvor og implementer: We take security seriously and implement robust measures to protect both user data and our system.
Alle aktiviteter logges og overvåkes for: All activities are logged and monitored to detect unusual patterns or security threats.
Vi anvender sikre standarder for krypter: We use secure standards for encryption and storage to prevent unauthorized access.
All trafikk til og fra tjenesten skjer v: All traffic to and from the service occurs via secure protocols to protect against data leaks.
Strenge regler for autentisering og auto: Strict authentication and authorization rules ensure that only authorized users have access to sensitive information.
Systemet er beskyttet mot vanlige angrep: The system is protected against common attacks such as brute force, injection attacks, and unauthorized access attempts.
Hvis du har spørsmål eller bekymringer a: If you have questions or concerns regarding the security of our website, you can contact us at:
Informasjonskapsler er små tekstfiler so: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are used to store information between visits.
En sesjon er en midlertidig tilkobling m: A session is a temporary connection between you and the website, securely stored on our server. We store session data for up to 5 days or until you log out (or request data deletion). After that, it's automatically deleted, and you will need to log in again. The cookie in your browser contains only an ID and no sensitive information.
Vi bruker kun en informasjonskapsel som: We only use one cookie necessary for the application to function properly:
Denne informasjonskapselen opprettes aut: This cookie is created automatically upon login and is used to keep you logged in as long as the session lasts. It contains no personal information and is deleted upon logout or after a period of inactivity.
I tillegg benyttes informasjonskapsler s: Additionally, cookies may be set by third-party APIs we use, such as weather data from
Disse brukes kun for å vise nødvendig fu: These are used only to display necessary functionality like weather forecasts and interactive maps, not for tracking or analytics.
Vi bruker ikke analyse- eller markedsfør: We do not use analytics or marketing cookies.
Du kan administrere og slette informasjo: You can manage and delete cookies through your browser settings. If you delete essential cookies, login and certain features may stop working.
5. Ønsker du å slette dine data?: 5. Do you wish to delete your data?
if you want to delete your data.
Vårt gratis medlemskap gir deg tilgang t: Our free membership gives you access to basic features at no cost. This option is ideal for new users or those who need simple access.
Med betalt medlemskap får du full tilgan: With a paid membership, you get full access to all features and priority customer support. This is the best option for active users who want maximum value.
Du kan administrere eller oppgradere abo: You can manage or upgrade your subscription via the "My subscription" subcategory under your membership at any time.
DiscGolf, also known as frisbee golf, is a sport where players throw a disc (frisbee) at a metal basket. The goal is to complete each course with as few throws as possible – similar to traditional golf. The sport is easy to learn, inexpensive to start, and suitable for all ages.
The game starts from a tee pad, and you throw from where the disc lands.
Hullet er fullført når disken havner i k: The hole is completed when the disc lands in the basket or hits the chains.
If the disc goes out of bounds (OB), you receive a penalty throw and continue from the point it went out.
Players should respect others and clean up after themselves.
Det brukes ulike typer disker:: Different types of discs are used:
for short, precise throws toward the basket.
To eller tre kast under par (-2, -3): Two or three throws under par (-2, -3)
For en full oversikt over reglene kan du: For a complete overview of the rules, you can read more at:
DiscGolf, også kjent som frisbeegolf, er: DiscGolf, also known as frisbee golf, is a sport where players throw a disc (frisbee) at a metal basket. The goal is to complete each course with as few throws as possible – similar to traditional golf. The sport is easy to learn, inexpensive to start, and suitable for all ages.

Vi er Discgolf Bø, en gruppe entusiastis: We are Discgolf Bø, a group of enthusiastic students from Bø who aim to make disc golf more engaging and accessible for everyone. Our passion for the sport and desire to create a better experience for players has led to the development of our web application.
Vi ønsker å gjøre discgolf til en sosial: We want to make disc golf a social and competitive sport where everyone, regardless of experience, can participate, learn, and have fun. Through our platform, we aim to connect players, clubs, and tournaments in a simple and efficient way.
Med vår app kan du enkelt registrere og: With our app, you can easily record and save the results of your disc golf rounds. Track your progress over time and share experiences with friends.
Bli med i spennende turneringer arranger: Join exciting tournaments organized by clubs or other players. Stay updated on upcoming events and sign up with just a few clicks.
Har du lyst til å starte din egen discgo: Want to start your own disc golf club? Do it easily through our website! Invite members, organize tournaments, and build a local disc golf community.
Søk opp klubber i ditt område og bli med: Search for clubs in your area and join to participate in activities, tournaments, and social events with other disc golf enthusiasts.
Vi er dedikerte til å skape en plattform: We are dedicated to creating a platform that is easy to use yet powerful enough to meet the needs of both beginners and experienced players. Our focus is on community, learning, and great experiences on the course.
Har du spørsmål, tilbakemeldinger eller: Do you have questions, feedback, or want to collaborate with us? Feel free to reach out to us via:
